snippet.title: Unity 3D - First game project: Last Stand - Game Devlog #1
snippet.description:
This is Devlog where I talk about building my first game project: Last Stand.
Its a Base Defender game where you need to defend agains waves of zombies.
The game was build using Unity Game engine.  In this video I introduce the game
a talk about some some of the UI work I have just implemented.

#laststand #indiegame #gamedev #devlog
